data.eml:eml: A new genus and species of Agalliini from China (Hemiptera, Cicadellidae, Megophthalminae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Li, Hu, Li, Zi-Zhong (2012): A new genus and species of Agalliini from China (Hemiptera, Cicadellidae, Megophthalminae). Zootaxa 3582: 57-63, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.214847
